description.value: All Squad Members, including the character, add +1 to Initiative Rolls. Any Squad Members may choose to use the Intelligence Bonus of this Character for their Initiative Rolls rather than their own Agility Bonus.

system.benefit: All Squad Members, including the character, add +1 to Initiative Rolls. Any Squad Members may choose to use the Intelligence Bonus of this Character for their Initiative Rolls rather than their own Agility Bonus.
